abstract: South Korea’s National Pension Service announced Tuesday that it would buy a small stake in Gatwick Airport in London as it seeks to increase its investments abroad.
snippet: South Korea’s National Pension Service announced Tuesday that it would buy a small stake in Gatwick Airport in London as it seeks to increase its investments abroad.
lead_paragraph: South Korea’s National Pension Service announced Tuesday that it would buy a small stake in Gatwick Airport in London as it sought to increase its investments abroad.

headline.main: Korean Pension Fund Buying Stake in Gatwick
